articles.title: Bob Chapek Will "Reset" the Disney Parks and Experiences Narrative Next Month With New Offering - Inside the Magic
articles.description: As Walt Disney CEO Bob Chapek signs on for another three years, one report finds he will "reset the narrative" next month.
